sqlMap.select: SELECT SIDO FROM TB_ZIP GROUP BY SIDO ORDER BY SIDO
SELECT GUGUN FROM TB_ZIP WHERE SIDO = #sido# GROUP BY GUGUN ORDER BY GUGUN
SELECT DONG FROM TB_ZIP WHERE SIDO = #sido# AND GUGUN = #gugun# GROUP BY DONG ORDER BY DONG

SELECT ZIPCODE zipCode , SIDO sido , GUGUN gugun , DONG dong , RI ri , BLDG bldg , nvl(BUNJI,' ') bunji , SEQ seq FROM TB_ZIP A WHERE SIDO = #sido# AND GUGUN = #gugun# AND DONG = #dong# ORDER BY A.SEQ
